name: nomos
description: _In greek mythology, Nomos is the personified spirit of law._

scripts.deploy: export NOMOS_VERSION=${NOMOS_VERSION:?nomos version required} && export NOMOS_HOSTNAME=${NOMOS_HOSTNAME:?nomos hostname required} && docker stack deploy -c nomos.stack.yml nomos
scripts.deploy:dev: export NOMOS_VERSION=${NOMOS_VERSION:-1.0.0.0-dev} && export NOMOS_CORE_REJECTUNAUTHORIZED=${NOMOS_CORE_REJECTUNAUTHORIZED:-false} && export NOMOS_HOSTNAME=${NOMOS_HOSTNAME:-nomos.local.dev.vanhack.ca} && docker stack deploy -c nomos.stack.yml nomos
